fr.xebia.mowitnow

Class Lawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xebia.mowitnow.Lawn

  • public final class Lawn
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a lawn :
    - Defines the size of the lawn and contains a list of lawnmowers.
    - Also handles the validation of the lawnmowers moves.
    Author:
    Charles Dufour

        public void addLawnmower(int x,
                         int y,
                         java.lang.String direction,
                         java.lang.String commands)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a lawnmower on the lawn.
        It must be added on an empty spot, and on the lawn (not out of bounds).
        Parameters:
        x - x position
        y - y position
        direction - cardinal direction
        commands -
        Throws:
